scripts.build: browserify --standalone TunaModel sources/tunaModel.js -o dist/tunaModel.js && browserify --standalone TunaUi sources/tunaUi.js -t  browserify-hogan sources/tunaUi.js -o dist/tunaUi.js
scripts.watch: watchify sources/tunaModel.js sources/tunaUi.js tunaDemo.js  -t  browserify-hogan sources/tunaUi.js  -o tunaDemo.bundle.js --verbose --debug
